bibl.title: Callimachus Posidippum aemulando superat.
bibl.note: AP VII 523 (Call. epigr. 60 Pf. = xxxix G.-P. HE 1225f.) < AP VII 269 ('Plat.' xx Page, FGE 648f.) > P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. ix, 33f. (Posidipp. 59 A.-B., 5f.). > AP VII 271 (Call. epigr. 17 Pf. = xlv G.-P. HE 1245ff.). - Thgn. 13f. > P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. xiii, 39f. (Posidipp. 88 A.-B., 5f.) > Call. epigr. 6 Pf., 3f. = lv G.-P. HE 1295f. - P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. viii, 6 (Posidipp. 48 A.-B., 4.) > AP VII 525, 4 (Call. epigr. 21 Pf., 4 = xxix G.-P. HE 1182) < AP VII 145, 4 (Asclepiades xxix G.-P. HE 949). - Athen. X 414e (Posidipp 121 A.-B., 7f. = xvi G.-P. HE 3140f.) > Call. fr. 75, 76f. - P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, col. xiv, 32. 34 (Posidipp. 95 A.-B., 3. 5) > AP VII 451 (Call. epigr. 9 Pf. = xli G.-P. HE 1231f.) < AP VII 170, 5f. (Posidipp 131 A.-B. = xxi G.-P. HE 3178f.).
FÜHRER Rudolf, Callimachus Posidippum aemulando superat.
